title: Auth Service
description: Built a robust authentication system with refresh token rotation, Redis-backed session tracking, OTP email verification, password recovery, rate limiting, and secure logout

title: Portfolio

title: Real Estate Portfolio
description: My first full-stack project: a real estate agent portfolio built with React.js and Spring Boot, including a backend-integrated contact form.
